common.min: Ce champ ne peut pas avoir la valeur 0.
common.number: Ce champ doit être un nombre.
common.maxlength: Ce champ ne doit pas dépasser 5 caractères.
common.timepicker: Ce champ doit avoir le format HH:MM.
common.date: Ce champ doit être une date.

quick.title: EVENT TITLE
quick.noprice: Vous n'avez renseigné aucun tarif, veuillez en ajouter un.

help.precisions: Precise the title of your event, which will be presented at the sale.
help.chooseplace: Choose a place for your event, or if there is not you can add it by clicking ' Add a Place'
help.describe: Describe your event as it will be offered for sale.
help.typeofevent: Specify the type of your event to facilitate the search for your events.
help.the: Enter your first date of your event, you will after validation of this form to add more.
help.at: Specify if necessary the start time of your event.
help.tva: Indicate at what rate of VAT is submitted your event
help.currency: Specify the currency used to manage your event
